title: Phase 1: Local Database Setup
description: Install expo-sqlite, create database service, schema, migrations, repositories for children and songs

title: Subtask: Investigate white screen root cause
description: Debug React app initialization, check console errors, verify component imports, check Redux store, and authentication flow

title: Bug: App blinks and shows white page
description: User reports app shows for fraction of second then disappears into white page. Need to investigate React rendering, router config, errors, and authentication flow.

title: Create missing UI components for BabySu mobile app
description: Create 12 essential components: 8 common components (Button, Input, Card, Avatar, LoadingSpinner, EmptyState, ErrorBoundary, OfflineIndicator) and 4 player components (AudioPlayer, PlayerControls, ProgressBar, MiniPlayer). Use react-native-paper and follow React Native best practices.

title: Phase 4: API Integration
description: Create API client, song generation service, network detection, integrate with Redux, add error handling

title: Comprehensive MCP & App Pipeline Testing
description: Systematically test all available MCP servers (Ahrefs, Ref, Magic) and validate BabySU app pipeline from auth → child profile → song generation → storage → playback

title: Phase 2: Local File Storage
description: Phase 2 verified complete: FileService.js, DownloadManager.js, CacheManager.js exist and functional.

title: Phase 7: Testing & QA
description: Write unit tests, integration tests, offline testing, performance testing, bug fixes

title: Subtask: Fix /me endpoint for dev tokens
description: Backend /api/auth/me needs to accept dev tokens for auto-login to work properly in development mode

title: ULTRATHINK: Complete App QC + Guest Pipeline Perfection
description: Comprehensive quality check of entire app. Fix song generation failure. Ensure guests can do EVERYTHING. Test with Chrome DevTools. Verify all pipelines end-to-end.

title: Phase 6: Audio Playback
description: Install react-native-track-player, create audio player service, add player UI, support background playback

title: Phase 5: UI Components & Screens
description: Copy UX/UI from webapp, build all screens (auth, children, songs, profile), create reusable components, add navigation

title: Subtask: Debug song generation failure
description: Check SongGeneratorPage, API routes, backend song.routes.js, verify Gemini+PiAPI integration

title: Run app locally and test song creation API
description: Start backend server, start webapp, and test song generation endpoint to verify music API integration works

title: Setup bd memory system for babysu project
description: Initialize bd (Beads) issue tracking system to provide persistent memory and coordination for AI agents working on the babysu project. This enables agents to track tasks, coordinate work, and maintain context across sessions.

title: Phase 8: Polish & Deployment
description: Add animations, optimize performance, build configuration, create production builds, documentation

title: Redesign as local-first mobile app with offline capabilities
description: Transform BabySu into a local-first mobile app: (1) Local SQLite database for child profiles, (2) Local file storage for downloaded songs, (3) API integration only for song creation, (4) Stream/download capability for generated songs, (5) Offline-first architecture

title: Phase 3: Redux Store & State Management
description: Configure Redux store, create all slices (auth, children, songs, player), add selectors and persistence

title: Backup app and execute local-first mobile transformation
description: Complete project: (1) Backup current app, (2) Create elaborate development plan, (3) Execute plan to transform into local-first mobile app, (4) Preserve all existing UX/UI

title: MASTER: Complete babysu transformation
description: Progress: Fixed AppNavigator imports, integrated navigation into App.js. Launched agent to create 12 missing UI components. Testing in progress.

title: Audit current state of BabySu project
description: Check backend, mobile, and webapp to determine what's working and what needs attention

title: Find Expo Go alternatives
description: User wants alternatives to Expo Go: web version, APK build, or direct Android. Test all options.

title: User Request: Deploy app to GitHub with security audit
description: Starting security audit. Scanning for secrets and sensitive data.

title: Test bd issue creation
description: Create test issues to demonstrate bd workflow

title: Bug: Guest login leads to blank white page
description: User clicks guest login and gets blank white page. Need to check guest flow, component rendering, and error logs

title: Subtask: Add missing auth API functions
description: Add login, register, and getCurrentUser functions to localApi.js auth object to fix white screen hang
